title: Enola Holmes
writer: Jack Thorne, Nancy Springer, Arthur Conan Doyle
actors: Millie Bobby Brown, Henry Cavill, Sam Claflin
plot: When Enola Holmes, Sherlock's sister, discovers her mother is missing, she endeavors to find her, becoming a super-sleuth in her own right as she outwits her famous brother and unravels a dangerous conspiracy.
